definitions: Noticing or perceiving something and registering it mentally.
Watching carefully the way something happens or someone does something, especially in order to learn more about it.
Fulfilling or abiding by a rule, law, or custom.
examples: She was observing the children playing in the park.
He spent hours observing the behavior of the birds.
They are observing the local traditions.
The scientists were observing the chemical reaction.
